Topic :: Formats and Protocols :: Protocols :: Web Services

name: MicroWSS
short_description: MicroWSS is a lightweight web services server/toolkit written in Java. Its purpose it to allow for simple development and deployment of services that use SOAP 1.2 and WSDL. It handles everything relating to XML, so that you only need to deal with Java.
